campaign.title: Automated Posting Guide
campaign.subject: Set up auto-posting and never miss a day

slides.title: Automated Posting
slides.narration: Consistency is key to social media success, but posting daily is exhausting. Automated posting solves this—schedule once, post automatically, stay visible without daily effort.

slides.title: What You'll Set Up
slides.narration: We'll set up content categories so posts are varied, your posting schedule for optimal times, an approval workflow so you stay in control, and performance tracking to see what works.

slides.title: Step 1: Content Categories
slides.narration: First, set up content categories. Educational content like tips and how-tos. Behind-the-scenes showing your work. Customer spotlights and testimonials. Promotional content about offers. Community and local connection posts. AI will rotate through these for variety.

slides.title: Step 2: Posting Schedule

content.timing: AI picks optimal times based on your audience

slides.narration: Set your posting frequency. Daily is recommended for maximum visibility. Five times per week if that feels like too much. Three times per week as a minimum. Don't worry about picking times—AI analyzes when your audience is active and posts then.

slides.title: Step 3: Approval Workflow
slides.narration: Choose your control level. Auto-post is completely hands-off. Review daily batch lets you approve tomorrow's posts in one sitting—takes about five minutes. Approve each post gives maximum control. We recommend daily batch review—good balance of control and efficiency.

slides.title: Step 4: Train Your AI
slides.narration: Train the AI on your voice. Share your best past posts as examples. Show competitor examples you like the style of. List words and phrases you commonly use. Specify topics to avoid. The more you train, the better the content matches your voice.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Review posts on Sunday for the week ahead
Add personal posts occasionally—don't be 100% automated
Check analytics monthly to refine categories

slides.narration: Pro tips for automated posting. Start with three times per week and increase once you're comfortable with the quality. Review posts on Sunday for the week ahead—one session handles everything. Add personal posts occasionally so you're not one hundred percent automated. Check analytics monthly to see which categories perform best.

slides.title: Start Automating
slides.narration: Ready to automate? Set up auto-posting now and start generating consistent content. Or see sample posts first to see the quality you can expect. Consistency without the grind—that's the goal.
